text: Rúguǒ zhēnzhǔ shǐ nǐ zhuǎn huíqù jiàn dào tāmen zhōng de yī huǒ rén, ér tāmen yāoqiú nǐ yǔnxǔ tāmen chūzhēng, nǐ jiù duì tāmen shuō: Nǐmen yǒngyuǎn bùyào tóng wǒ yīdào chūzhēng, nǐmen jué bùyào tóng wǒ yīdào qù zuòzhàn; nǐmen chūcì què yǐ xǐhuān ānzuò jiāzhōng, wǎng hòu, nǐmen jiù tóng liú zài hòufāng de rénmen yīqǐ ānzuò jiāzhōng ba!
